description: This 3 bed 2.5 bath plus den home at Polygon's Ridgewood is part of a new collection of Farmhouse-Style townhomes in Coquitlam's Burke Mountain. Nestled in the heart of nature, this 1,431 sq. ft. home features an open main floor with expansive windows, warm wood laminate flooring, and a patio off the dining area. This home's inspiring kitchen boasts modern cabinetry, sleek stainless steel appliances, engineered stone countertops and full-height marble tile backsplash. Upstairs, the primary ensuite features a spa shower with a built-in bench. Plus, enjoy the convenience of a heat pump air conditioning system. Visit our sales office and two display homes at 3637 Sheffield Avenue, Coquitlam, open noon - 5pm daily (except Friday), to learn more.
